review: very easy to set up, able to view wide verity of movies and tv shows....

review: Very easy to use! Great purchase!
author: vostro21

review: Great product. We have a FireTV and got the FireTV stick for an extra bedroom TV. Great product with fast load times.
author: Mike

review: Everything is great expect Plex. It has a bug where is keeps asking to activate and it seems that Amazon is taking a while to work with them to fix it; 5 stars once it's fixed.
author: Amazon Customer

review: So far it has met my expectations very well.
author: David Prentice

review: The unit met all expectations and is working great.
author: Tim  Fontenot

review: I love Fire TV, and this stick fits perfectly in a small space.  Everything I have on my other TV, I have here, and spent less.
author: katcron "radikate"

review: This didn't work for me very well forTwo reasons, I feel like it loads things slowly and there is no vudu app. We have a playstation it seems faster and has more apps.
author: Smarlow

review: We got this for my daughter to stream amazon prime. Works great and she loves that she doesn't have to watch her favorite shows on her kindle any more.
author: Mary Grover
